description: The 'Primary Role' field depends on the underlying security groups being defined.
mitigation_plan: Both tasks are in the same sprint and assigned to backend developers.

description: The record rule for drivers depends on the 'tms.trip' model being defined.
mitigation_plan: Prioritize the `tms.trip` model definition early in Sprint 2 to unblock security rule development.
impact_if_delayed: Delays implementation of critical driver data segregation.

description: S3 configuration is required before the document upload feature can be fully tested and validated.
mitigation_plan: Schedule the DevOps S3 task early in Sprint 3 to provide ample time for integration and QA.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks vehicle compliance features and risks spilling into the next sprint.
